cases.description: Compact electronics enclosure with a USB-C port, a small status LED, and mounting posts for a PCB.
Weather sensor node housing with a vented lid, battery compartment, and two external sensors.
Handheld remote enclosure with three buttons and a small display window.
A cute teddy bear plush toy with round ears, big eyes, and short arms.
A small robot character toy with a round head, two arms, and short legs.
A desk figurine of a cat with a rounded body and a small tail.
